original_text: The soldiers' leader wanted to find the reason why the Jews had said bad things against Paul. He wanted to know what was really true. So the next day, he told his soldiers to remove the chains from Paul. He sent a message to the most important priest and to all the group of Jewish leaders. He told them to meet together with him. Then he took Paul to their meeting. He made Paul stand in front of them.
korean_text: 이튿날 천부장은 유대인들이 무슨 일로 그를 고발하는지 진상을 알고자 하여 그 결박을 풀고 명하여 제사장들과 온 공회를 모으고 바울을 데리고 내려가서 그들 앞에 세우니라

sentences.original_text: The soldiers' leader wanted to find the reason
sentences.korean_translation: 군대의 지도자는 그 이유를 찾고 싶어했습니다

sentences.original_text: why the Jews had said bad things against Paul
sentences.korean_translation: 유대인들이 바울에 대해 나쁜 말을 한 이유를

sentences.original_text: He wanted to know what was really true
So the next day, he told his soldiers to remove the chains from Paul
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 다음 날, 그는 군인들에게 바울의 쇠사슬을 풀라고 명령했습니다

sentences.original_text: He sent a message to the most important priest
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 가장 중요한 제사장에게 메시지를 보냈습니다

sentences.original_text: and to all the group of Jewish leaders
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 모든 유대인 지도자 그룹에게도 메시지를 보냈습니다

sentences.original_text: He told them to meet together with him
Then he took Paul to their meeting
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 바울을 그들의 회의 장소로 데려갔습니다

sentences.original_text: He made Paul stand in front of them
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 바울이 그들 앞에 서게 했습니다
